alerts.message: TikTok-Somali has 67% data waste from emoji-only filtering.
alerts.details: **Stream connection failed.** Check API credentials, network connectivity, and rate limits.
alerts.recommendation: Apify scrapes all comments ($1.00/1K), but ~67% are emoji-only and filtered locally. Options: (1) Scale to more videos for better ROI (current cost: ~$3.03/1K linguistic comments), (2) Investigate Apify Comments Analyzer AI Agent for pre-filtering, or (3) Accept current ~33% yield as baseline. Economic inefficiency: This is a cost optimization issue, not technical failure.

alerts.message: Wikipedia-Somali quality pass rate at 64.2% is below the 70% threshold.
alerts.recommendation: Review filter breakdown to identify primary rejection reasons. Consider adjusting filter thresholds or improving source data quality.

alerts.details: **Slow fetch times detected.** Consider implementing connection pooling, adjusting timeouts, or using concurrent requests.
alerts.recommendation: Implement connection pooling, adjust timeouts, or use concurrent requests. Consider adding caching layer for frequently accessed content.
